page.title: 16A family day in Gt.Alne
page.content: At about 07.00 The mother wakes up. The father wakes up at 07.10 and gets up immediately.Breakfast is at about 08.00,the father departs for work at 08.30.The children are picked up and taken to Great Alne J&I school.A school lunch is available but like most,they take sandwiches.The school runs from 09.00 to 15.30. Sometimes there are school clubs. The father works in Redditch,for BKL.He works from 08.45 to 17.00 with hours of 08.45_15.45 on Fridays. The mother stays at home all day, occasionally she goes to Alcester, shopping.At 15.25 she makes drinks for the children.They are picked up from school and brought home.Then they get into rough clothes and play in the garden.When the father gets home it is tea time.They go to bed between 20.00 and 21.25.
